subject: Re: Installing Debian Etch on a Thinkpad T61 ipw3945/ipw4965
body:
Hello,

Correction regarding my post :

The Thinkpad T61 i tested had a 4965 wireless chipset (not a 3945 as i
thought) ... of course the ipw3945 driver failed to load !!

Please ignore comments related to the 3945 in my last post.

Sorry for that,

Franklin

On Wed, 2007-05-23 at 20:17 +0200, Franklin PIAT wrote:
> Note 2:
> The ipw3945 module refused to load with this 3945 card.



--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
